definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The previous record was held by an Indian man who delivered a 120-hour speech.
sentences.chinese: 此前的纪录为120小时，由一个印度人创造。

sentences.english: The Indians know full well that China expects obedience from its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 印度人清楚地知道，中国希望其邻国乖乖地服从领导。

sentences.english: But now it seems Indians, too, are getting less worked up about dalliances.
sentences.chinese: 如今似乎印度人也对放荡不那么激动了。

sentences.english: In particular - he says - there's no climate of respecting failure.
sentences.chinese: 他特别指出，印度人向来不畏失败。

sentences.english: By contrast, almost every Indian has a basic English vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 反而，几乎每个印度人都了解基本的英语词汇。

sentences.english: Aaah, Indians and Chinese fighting in cyberspace.
sentences.chinese: 哈，中国人和印度人在网上互喷。

sentences.english: Many think India is an all-Hindu country, but it’s not.
sentences.chinese: 许多人认为印度人都是印度教教徒，但其实不然。

sentences.english: The Chinese women over here wouldn't touch a smelly Indian with a 10-foot pole.
sentences.chinese: 中国女人不会靠近臭哄哄的印度人10尺之内。

sentences.english: Part of the reason Indians favor sons is the enormous expense in marrying off girls.
sentences.chinese: 印度人这么喜欢儿子的部分原因是嫁掉女儿太费钱。

sentences.english: Nahh, just give it to the smelly Indian.
sentences.chinese: 还是把机会留给臭印度人吧。

sentences.english: Like the Hindus, the Arabs worked freely with irrationals.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯人也象印度人那样随便使用无理数。

sentences.english: Indians are generally keen on the animal in whose form is manifested a popular god, Ganesh.
sentences.chinese: 印度人普遍非常喜欢该种显现了象头神格涅沙的动物。

sentences.english: India drinks Coke, but loves Pepsi, too.
sentences.chinese: 印度人喝可乐，但也喜欢百事。

sentences.english: But it was a painful kind of awe.
sentences.chinese: 但这种敬畏却也是令印度人痛苦的。

sentences.english: The people of western India fall into two categories.
sentences.chinese: 西印度人分为两种类型。

sentences.english: Inflation has set like cement into that divide, solidifying the gap between the two Indias.
sentences.chinese: 通胀就像是水泥，巩固两种印度人之间的鸿沟。

definition: (coll.) an American/person from the United States

pinyin: Sha1 te4 A1 la1 bo2 ren2
